languages.text: "Я дарую друзианцам право решить судьбу Его Преосвященства. Считаю, что отец Иеронимус больше всех понимает в смирении и святости".
languages.translation_comment:
Запускается этюд VP_CardinalFlagelliant
Дать репы с Друзом
Оставляем кардинала в живых — он уходит к друзианцам
Весы направо

Весы направо

languages.text: "I grant the Drusians the right to decide the cardinal's fate. It is my belief that Reverend Hieronymus is unsurpassed in his comprehension of humility and holiness."
languages.original_text: "Я дарую друзианцам право решить судьбу Его Преосвященства. Считаю, что отец Иеронимус больше всех понимает в смирении и святости".

traits.locale_text: "I grant the Drusians the right to decide His Holiness's fate. It is my belief that Reverend Hieronymus is unsurpassed in his comprehension of humility and holiness."
"I grant the Drusians the right to decide His Holiness's fate. It is my belief that Reverend Hieronymus is unsurpassed in his comprehension of humility and holiness."
"I grant the Drusians the right to decide His Eminence's fate. It is my belief that Reverend Hieronymus is unsurpassed in his comprehension of humility and holiness."
"I grant the Drusians the right to decide His Eminence's fate. It is my belief that Reverend Hieronymus is unsurpassed in his comprehension of humility and holiness."
"I grant the Drusians the right to decide the cardinal's fate. It is my belief that Reverend Hieronymus is unsurpassed in his comprehension of humility and holiness."
"I grant the Drusians the right to decide the cardinal's fate. It is my belief that Reverend Hieronymus is unsurpassed in his comprehension of humility and holiness."

languages.text: "Ich gewähre den Drusianern das Recht, über das Schicksal des Kardinals zu befinden. Ich bin der festen Überzeugung, dass Reverend Hieronymus hinsichtlich seiner Auffassung von Demut und Heiligkeit beispiellos ist."
languages.original_text: "I grant the Drusians the right to decide the cardinal's fate. It is my belief that Reverend Hieronymus is unsurpassed in his comprehension of humility and holiness."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gewähre den Drusianern das Recht, über das Schicksal des Kardinals zu befinden. Ich bin der festen Überzeugung, dass Reverend Hieronymus hinsichtlich seiner Auffassung von Demut und Heiligkeit beispiellos ist."

"Ich gewähre den Drusianern das Recht, über das Schicksal Seiner Eminenz zu befinden. Ich bin der festen Überzeugung, dass Reverend Hieronymus hinsichtlich seiner Auffassung von Demut und Heiligkeit beispiellos ist."

languages.text: « J'accorde aux Drusiens le droit de décider du sort du cardinal. Je suis intimement {mf|convaincu|convaincue} que le révérend Hiéronymus comprend mieux que quiconque les concepts d'humilité et de sainteté. »
languages.original_text: "I grant the Drusians the right to decide the cardinal's fate. It is my belief that Reverend Hieronymus is unsurpassed in his comprehension of humility and holiness."

traits.locale_text: « J'accorde aux Drusiens le droit de décider du sort du cardinal. Je suis intimement {mf|convaincu|convaincue} que le révérend Hiéronymus comprend mieux que quiconque les concepts d'humilité et de sainteté. »

« J'accorde aux Drusiens le droit de décider du sort de Son Éminence. Je suis intimement {mf|convaincu|convaincue} que le révérend Hiéronymus comprend mieux que quiconque les concepts d'humilité et de sainteté. »

languages.text: “我在此将红衣主教的命运托付给德鲁苏斯教派。我相信，若是论及对谦卑与圣洁的理解，没人能比得上希罗尼穆斯牧师。”
languages.original_text: "I grant the Drusians the right to decide the cardinal's fate. It is my belief that Reverend Hieronymus is unsurpassed in his comprehension of humility and holiness."

traits.locale_text: “我在此将红衣主教的命运托付给德鲁苏斯教派。我相信，若是论及对谦卑与圣洁的理解，没人能比得上希罗尼穆斯牧师。”
“我在此将主教大人的命运托付给德鲁苏斯教派。我相信，论及对谦卑与圣洁的理解，没人能比得上希罗尼穆斯牧师。”

languages.text: «Otorgo a los drusianos el derecho de decidir el destino del cardenal. A mi juicio, el reverendo Hieronymus conoce la humildad y la santidad mejor que nadie».
languages.original_text: "I grant the Drusians the right to decide the cardinal's fate. It is my belief that Reverend Hieronymus is unsurpassed in his comprehension of humility and holiness."

traits.locale_text: «Otorgo a los drusianos el derecho de decidir el destino del cardenal. A mi juicio, el reverendo Hieronymus conoce la humildad y la santidad mejor que nadie».
«Otorgo a los drusianos el derecho de decidir el destino de Su Eminencia. A mi juicio, el reverendo Hieronymus conoce la humildad y la santidad mejor que nadie».

languages.text: 「ドルシアンに、猊下の運命を決定する権利を与える。ヒエロニムス司祭が謙虚さと聖性の理解において比類なき存在であると信じている」
languages.original_text: "I grant the Drusians the right to decide His Eminence's fate. It is my belief that Reverend Hieronymus is unsurpassed in his comprehension of humility and holiness."

traits.locale_text: 「ドルシアンに、猊下の運命を決定する権利を与える。ヒエロニムス司祭が謙虚さと聖性の理解において比類なき存在であると信じている」

languages.text: "Kardinalin akıbetini belirleme hakkı, Drususçulara verilmiştir. Muhterem Hieronymus'un tevazu ve kutsiyet idrakına inancım tamdır."
languages.original_text: "I grant the Drusians the right to decide the cardinal's fate. It is my belief that Reverend Hieronymus is unsurpassed in his comprehension of humility and holiness."

traits.locale_text: "Kardinalin akıbetini belirleme hakkı, Drususçulara verilmiştir. Muhterem Hieronymus'un tevazu ve kutsiyet idrakına inancım tamdır."
"Sayın Kardinal'in akıbetini belirleme hakkı, Drususçulara verilmiştir. Muhterem Hieronymus'un tevazu ve kutsiyet idrakına inancım tamdır."
